channel.title: Sid Ghodke - Portfolio
channel.description: I live in Northern California. These days I'm involved mostly in software - but I still find time for surfing, reading, and writing. A lot of my recent work involves digital health and team building.

item.title: Technology
item.description: Sid did residency training in general surgery and has been practicing medicine since 2007. He is currently licensed in 16 states (AZ, CA, DC, FL, GA, IL, MA, MI, NC, NY, OH, PA, UT, VA, WA, WI) and is clinically active as a private practitioner and as an on-call physician at UCSF Medical Center and Main Line Health.
item.author: address@yoursite.com (Sid Ghodke)

channel.item: https://tailwind-nextjs-starter-blog.vercel.app/blog/speeches Speaking https://tailwind-nextjs-starter-blog.vercel.app/blog/speeches Sid is an active speaker and guest lecturer at various national conferences and academic forums. His topics include clinical medicine, digital and global health, entrepreneurship and innovation, Medicaid/Medicare, patient engagement, product development and technology, social determinants of health, and telemedicine. Sun, 02 May 2021 00:00:00 GMT address@yoursite.com (Sid Ghodke) undefined

https://tailwind-nextjs-starter-blog.vercel.app/blog/entrepreneur Entrepreneur https://tailwind-nextjs-starter-blog.vercel.app/blog/entrepreneur Sid started his first company, FIMRC, almost 20 years ago to improve access to health care for underserved populations. He has since co-founded or served as a senior executive for several venture-backed health technology companies in Columbus, New York City, Los Angeles, and San Francisco. Tue, 12 Jan 2021 00:00:00 GMT address@yoursite.com (Sid Ghodke) undefined

https://tailwind-nextjs-starter-blog.vercel.app/blog/media Media & Publications https://tailwind-nextjs-starter-blog.vercel.app/blog/media If you are interested in having Sid participate in your program or contribute content, please send an email to Sid. Wed, 11 Nov 2020 00:00:00 GMT address@yoursite.com (Sid Ghodke) undefined

item.title: Foundation for International Medical Relief of Children (FIMRC)
item.description: Founder & Chairman of the Board. FIMRC is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization dedicated to improving access to health care for underserved populations in the developing world.
item.author: address@yoursite.com (Sid Ghodke)
